languages.text: "П-правда?" {n}Кассия склоняет голову на бок и скромно улыбается, хоть в ее глазах вы и читаете легкое разочарование.{/n} "Ну а я в свою очередь с удовольствием принимаю вашу. И надеюсь, что особая связь между нами и нашими династиями продержится не одно столетие".

traits.locale_text: "П-правда?" {n}Кассия склоняет голову на бок и скромно улыбается, хоть в ее глазах вы и читаете легкое разочарование.{/n} "Ну а я в свою очередь с удовольствием принимаю вашу. И надеюсь, что особая связь между нами и нашими династиями продержится не одно столетие".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "R-really?" {n}Cassia tilts her head to the side and smiles shyly, but you still detect slight disappointment in her eyes.{/n} "Then, I, in turn, gladly accept yours. And I hope that the special link between us and our dynasties will span many centuries."
languages.original_text: "П-правда?" {n}Кассия склоняет голову на бок и скромно улыбается, хоть в ее глазах вы и читаете легкое разочарование.{/n} "Ну а я в свою очередь с удовольствием принимаю вашу. И надеюсь, что особая связь между нами и нашими династиями продержится не одно столетие".

traits.locale_text: "R-Really?" {n}Cassia tilts her head to the side and smiles shyly, but you still detect slight disappointment in her eyes.{/n} "Then, I, in turn, gladly accept yours. And I hope that the special link between us and our dynasties will span many centuries."

traits.locale_text: "R-Really?" {n}Cassia tilts her head to the side and smiles shyly, but you still detect slight disappointment in her eyes.{/n} "Then, I, in turn, gladly accept yours. And I hope that the special link between us and our dynasties will span many centuries."

traits.locale_text: "R-really?" {n}Cassia tilts her head to the side and smiles shyly, but you still detect slight disappointment in her eyes.{/n} "Then, I, in turn, gladly accept yours. And I hope that the special link between us and our dynasties will span many centuries."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿De... de verdad?». {n}Cassia ladea la cabeza y sonríe azorada, pero notas un atisbo de decepción en su mirada.{/n} «Entonces yo, a cambio, acepto gustosa la suya. Y espero que el vínculo especial que une nuestras dinastías perdure durante muchos siglos».
languages.original_text: "R-really?" {n}Cassia tilts her head to the side and smiles shyly, but you still detect slight disappointment in her eyes.{/n} "Then, I, in turn, gladly accept yours. And I hope that the special link between us and our dynasties will span many centuries."

traits.locale_text: «¿De... de verdad?». {n}Cassia ladea la cabeza y sonríe azorada, pero notas un atisbo de decepción en su mirada.{/n} «Entonces yo, a cambio, acepto gustosa la suya. Y espero que el vínculo especial que une nuestras dinastías perdure durante muchos siglos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ほ、本当ですか？」{n}カシアは首をかしげて恥ずかしそうに笑うが、彼女の目にはわずかに失望が浮かんでいる。{/n}「では、私もあなたの友情を喜んで受け入れましょう。私たちと両王朝の特別なつながりが、この先何百年も続くことを願います」
languages.original_text: "R-really?" {n}Cassia tilts her head to the side and smiles shyly, but you still detect slight disappointment in her eyes.{/n} "Then, I, in turn, gladly accept yours. And I hope that the special link between us and our dynasties will span many centuries."

traits.locale_text: 「ほ、本当ですか？」{n}カシアは首をかしげて恥ずかしそうに笑うが、彼女の目にはわずかに失望が浮かんでいる。{/n}「では、私もあなたの友情を喜んで受け入れましょう。私たちと両王朝の特別なつながりが、この先何百年も続くことを願います」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “真……真的吗？”{n}卡西娅歪过头，害羞地微笑起来。然而你却能注意到，她眼底透着些许失望。{/n}“那么，我，作为回应，也很高兴接受你的友谊。我希望我们两人，以及我们两个王朝间的特殊联系能跨越数个世纪。”
languages.original_text: "R-really?" {n}Cassia tilts her head to the side and smiles shyly, but you still detect slight disappointment in her eyes.{/n} "Then, I, in turn, gladly accept yours. And I hope that the special link between us and our dynasties will span many centuries."

traits.locale_text: “真……真的吗？”{n}卡西娅歪过头，害羞地微笑起来。然而你却能注意到，她眼底透着些许失望。{/n}“那么，我，作为回应，也很高兴接受你的友谊。我希望我们两人，以及我们两个王朝间的特殊联系能跨越数个世纪。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « V-Vraiment ? » {n}Cassia penche la tête sur le côté et sourit timidement, mais vous décelez une légère déception dans son regard.{/n} « Dans ce cas, j'accepte volontiers la vôtre. Et j'espère que le lien spécial qui nous unit, nous et nos dynasties, perdurera de nombreux siècles. »
languages.original_text: "R-really?" {n}Cassia tilts her head to the side and smiles shyly, but you still detect slight disappointment in her eyes.{/n} "Then, I, in turn, gladly accept yours. And I hope that the special link between us and our dynasties will span many centuries."

traits.locale_text: « V-Vraiment ? » {n}Cassia penche la tête sur le côté et sourit timidement, mais vous décelez une légère déception dans son regard.{/n} « Dans ce cas, j'accepte volontiers la vôtre. Et j'espère que le lien spécial qui nous unit, nous et nos dynasties, perdurera de nombreux siècles. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "W-Wirklich?" {n}Cassia neigt den Kopf zur Seite und lächelt schüchtern, doch du entdeckst dennoch eine leichte Enttäuschung in ihren Augen.{/n} "Dann akzeptiere ich im Gegenzug gern auch das Eure. Und ich hoffe, dass sich die besondere Verbindung zwischen uns und unseren Dynastien über viele Jahrhunderte erstrecken wird."
languages.original_text: "R-really?" {n}Cassia tilts her head to the side and smiles shyly, but you still detect slight disappointment in her eyes.{/n} "Then, I, in turn, gladly accept yours. And I hope that the special link between us and our dynasties will span many centuries."

traits.locale_text: "W-Wirklich?" {n}Cassia neigt den Kopf zur Seite und lächelt schüchtern, doch du entdeckst dennoch eine leichte Enttäuschung in ihren Augen.{/n} "Dann akzeptiere ich im Gegenzug gern auch das Eure. Und ich hoffe, dass sich die besondere Verbindung zwischen uns und unseren Dynastien über viele Jahrhunderte erstrecken wird."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "R-Really?" {n}Cassia tilts her head to the side and smiles shyly, but you still detect slight disappointment in her eyes.{/n} "Then, I, in turn, gladly accept yours. And I hope that the special link between us and our dynasties will span many centuries."

languages.text: "G... Gerçekten mi?" {n}Cassia, başını yana eğip utanarak gülümsüyor. Buna rağmen gözlerinde hafif bir hayal kırıklığı seziyorsun.{/n} "O hâlde ben de memnuniyetle arkadaşlığını kabul ediyorum. Umarım ikimizin ve hanedanlıklarımızın arasındaki özel bağ, yüzyıllarca sürer."
languages.original_text: "R-really?" {n}Cassia tilts her head to the side and smiles shyly, but you still detect slight disappointment in her eyes.{/n} "Then, I, in turn, gladly accept yours. And I hope that the special link between us and our dynasties will span many centuries."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten mi?" {n}Cassia başını yana eğip utanarak gülümsüyor ama buna rağmen gözlerinde hafif bir hayal kırıklığı seziyorsun.{/n} "O hâlde ben de memnuniyetle arkadaşlığını kabul ediyorum. Umarım ikimizin ve hanedanlıklarımızın arasındaki özel bağ, yüzyıllarca sürer."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
